column4: I there anyone out there that uses a modem to dialup on fiesty?
OK IM not some rich kid who has money to waste on a 20$ month DSL connection there is not DSL out where we live and the satelight is way too much im happy spending 10$ on a 7KB modem conection Ok?
what did you say 7Kb/s is max speed on your connection ?
okay... but this is a dial-up connection... so you paid for phone
